sections.body:
Before Combat The assassin casts barkskin and longstrider. He applies poison to his scythe, and wild shapes into an eagle or dire rat.

During Combat In animal form, the assassin studies an enemy spellcaster for 3 rounds before casting obscuring mist to sow chaos among his foes. He then takes his real form to make a death attack against his target. In melee, he trips his foes.

Base Statistics Without barkskin and longstrider, the assassin's statistics are

AC 24, touch 12, flat-footed 24

Speed 20 ft.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Many of these murderers serve as assassins for dark druid circles or dominate savage humanoid tribes.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Assassin/Assassins/Murderous Scythe/Zelath the Reaper

sections.body: Knowing that death is just part of the cycle of life, Zelath truly believes his murderous ways enforces the will of nature. Like a deadly gardener, he prunes those who dare thwart death's call or despoil nature.
Zelath aids other druids in the protection of their homes, bringing his unorthodox talents for mutual defense and strategic offense.
Zelath often offers his expert knowledge of poisons to friends of the natural order.
